entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Tillsonburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
